thread.title: CloudMoyo Achieves Microsoft Gold Certified Cloud Partner Status & Launches New Website
thread.title_full: CloudMoyo Achieves Microsoft Gold Certified Cloud Partner Status & Launches New Website

author: admin
title: CloudMoyo Achieves Microsoft Gold Certified Cloud Partner Status & Launches New Website
text:
Submitted by admin on 10/12/2015 @ 8:00 AM Companies mentioned in this article: CloudMoyo Inc. 
BELLEVUE, Wash., Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- CloudMoyo Inc., the partner of choice for solutions at the intersection of Cloud and advanced Analytics, today announced that the company has achieved Microsoft Gold Certification for Microsoft Cloud, the highest level of competency. The company is a trusted and go-to partner for Microsoft's advanced Analytics. This certification shows CloudMoyo's strengths and commitment to customer delight for cloud and advanced analytics solutions. 
CloudMoyo launched a newly-redesigned website offering quick and easy access to solutions and services which includes an efficient roadmap to harness the power of the Cloud for modern organizations. We demonstrate how our customers benefit from using our trusted solutions for healthcare, life sciences and transportation industries. The website at www.cloudmoyo.com shows an extensive set of case studies and customer success stories and goes live on October 12, 2015. 
"We believe that receiving this gold certification in such a short time shows our passion and commitment to our customers," says Manish Kedia, CEO and President, CloudMoyo. "We found that our customers need more guidance when it comes to benefitting from the use of Cloud and advanced Analytics, our new site provides that experience." 
About CloudMoyo 
CloudMoyo is the partner of choice for solutions at the intersection of cloud and analytics. The company: -- Enables Healthcare and Life sciences customers to enhance their digital consumer experience and improve regulatory compliance visibility. -- Empowers Transportation and Logistics companies to unlock efficiencies in Fleet Management and Public & Goods Transportation. -- Helps modern organizations define their path to the Cloud and leverage the power of data driven insights. 
Headquartered in Bellevue, WA, with an innovation center in Pune India, CloudMoyo is set apart by the company's relentless focus on customer delight, the strength of its smart technology accelerators, such as the CloudMoyo Cloud and Analytics Framework (CAF), a strong business domain experience, and a deep pool of technical talent with experience in the Microsoft Cloud. They have a proven track record includes developing enterprise solutions for Global Fortune 1000 companies such as Microsoft, Roche, Toyota, Kansas City Southern and others. 
Contact: For any other additional information, write to: contact@cloudmoyo.com 
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/cloudmoyo-achieves-microsoft-gold-certified-cloud-partner-status--launches-new-website-300157800.html 
SOURCE CloudMoyo Inc.
